.. py:class:: MapMethodClass(*args, **kwargs)


   Bases: :py:obj:`telegraph.methods._methods.MethodClass`

   Helper class that provides a standard way to create an ABC using
   inheritance.

   .. py:method:: run(input_dict: Dict[str, Any], use_emb: bool = False, **kwargs) -> Dict[str, numpy.ndarray] | Dict[str, scipy.sparse.spmatrix]
      :classmethod:
      :abstractmethod:
